name: Rhythm Warrior
description:
Submission to Minijam 112 - Chrono

--If the beat is not synced with the music, please download the windows version--

--Best experienced in fullscreen--

-----

Fight against a terrible foe in this Rhythm Action game

Move to the rhythm of the music to evade your enemy's attacks and put him down

-----

CONTROLS :

Z/W/UP ARROW: MOVE UP

S/DOWN ARROW: MOVE DOWN

D/RIGHT ARROW: ATTACK/ SELECT MENU OPTION
